means: 对（某事物）表示[感到]怀疑

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"问，询问"之意。
means: ask ：最普通用词，可与demand, inquire和question换用，但ask用于口语中，指提出问题让人回答。
demand ：指根据自己的权利、职责或身份认为有必要弄清情况而正式发问，常隐含命令对方回答的意味。
inquire ：较正式用词，指为得到真实情况而详细询问或调查了解。
question ：指因感到可疑或为了解情况，弄清究竟而发问，有时指一连串的发问。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"问题"之意。
means: problem ： 指客观上存在的、难以处理或难以理解的问题。
question ： 通常指用口头或书面提出来要求回答或有待讨论解决的问题。
issue ： 多指意见能达到一致的问题，着重争论或讨论中的问题。
matter ： 含义不很具体，暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。

sentence.Network_en: This brings us to the second question I asked.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就将我们带到了我所提的第二个问题。

sentence.Network_en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentence.Network_en: One more question and I'll leave you in peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 再问一个问题，我就不打扰你了。

jx.jx_en_mean: be certain to happen sooner or later
jx.jx_cn_mean: 只是时间问题，迟早会发生

jx.jx_en_mean: raise an issue for further consideration or discussion
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使人们进一步考虑（或讨论）某事

lj.lj_ly: technology had brought into question the whole future of work.
lj.lj_ls: 技术促使人们进一步考虑整个工作前景。

jx.jx_en_mean: become an issue for further consideration or discussion

lj.lj_ly: our Sunday Trading laws have come into question.
lj.lj_ls: 我们的星期日贸易法已得到进一步讨论。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 正被谈论的，讨论中的；考虑中的；辩论中的

lj.lj_ly: on the day in question, there were several serious emergencies.
lj.lj_ls: 就在那一天，发生了几件严重的紧急事件。

lj.lj_ly: all of the old certainties are in question.
lj.lj_ls: 以往所有的定论都令人怀疑。

jx.jx_cn_mean: （正式辩论或会议用语）把议题提请表决

lj.lj_ly: Starting over is out of the question.

means.word_mean: 询问,探问
其他释义
问题
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French question (noun), questionner (verb), from Latin quaestio(n-), from quaerere 'ask, seek'

encyclopedia.content: 日本Johnnys偶像团体,现为Jr.尚未出道。以BAND型态组成的团体，J家组合演唱会上由他们担任音乐演奏。

entry.def: A question is something that you say or write in order to ask a person about something.

example.ex: They asked a great many questions about England...
example.tran: 他们问了一大堆有关英格兰的问题。

example.ex: The President refused to answer further questions on the subject...
example.tran: 总统拒绝就这个话题再回答问题。

entry.def: If you question someone, you ask them a lot of questions about something.

example.ex: This led the therapist to question Jim about his parents and their marriage...
example.tran: 这让治疗专家问起了吉姆有关他父母及他们婚姻的情况。

example.ex: A man is being questioned by police in connection with an attack on a disabled woman.
example.tran: 警方正在询问一名涉嫌袭击一位残疾女性的男子。

entry.def: If you question something, you have or express doubts about whether it is true, reasonable, or worthwhile.

example.ex: It never occurs to them to question the doctor's decisions...
example.tran: 他们从未想过要怀疑医生的决定。

example.ex: Weber is challenging his audience to question their own beliefs.
example.tran: 韦伯正要求观众们反思质疑各自的信仰。

entry.def: If you say that there is some question about something, you mean that there is doubt or uncertainty about it. If something is in question or has been called into question, doubt or uncertainty has been expressed about it.

example.ex: There's no question about their success...
example.tran: 他们一定会成功。

example.ex: There's some question as to whether he will sign this resolution...
example.tran: 他是否会签署这项决议还不能确定。

entry.def: A question is a problem, matter, or point which needs to be considered.

example.ex: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one...
example.tran: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。

example.ex: That decision raised questions about the secretary of state's powers and the fairness of his procedure.
example.tran: 那个决定引起人们对国务卿的权力及其做法的公平性的质疑。

entry.def: The questions in an examination are the problems which are set in order to test your knowledge or ability.

example.ex: He'd heard somewhere that the questions in economics examination papers stayed the same from year to year...
example.tran: 他从某处听说经济学考试的考题年年都一样。

example.ex: That question did come up in the examination.
example.tran: 那道题确实在考试中出现了。

entry.tran: 问得好，问得真有水平(用于问题难以回答、不便回答或不知道答案时)
entry.def: If you say 'Good question' in reply to a question, you mean that it is a difficult question to answer, or perhaps that you are embarrassed about the answer or do not know the answer.

example.ex: 'Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?'—'Good question.'
example.tran: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

entry.tran: 被提及的;讨论中的;相关的
entry.def: The person, thing, or time in question is one which you have just been talking about or which is relevant.

example.ex: The player in question is Mark Williams...
example.tran: 我们所说的那个选手是马克·威廉斯。

example.ex: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
example.tran: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

entry.tran: 不可能;办不到;无法接受
entry.def: If you say that something is out of the question, you are emphasizing that it is completely impossible or unacceptable.

example.ex: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question...
example.tran: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

example.ex: Is a tax increase still out of the question?
example.tran: 增加税收仍然是不可能的事吗？

entry.def: If you pop the question, you ask someone to marry you.

example.ex: Stuart got serious quickly and popped the question six months later.
example.tran: 斯图尔特很快认真起来，6个月之后便求婚了。

entry.def: If you say there is no question of something happening, you are emphasizing that it is not going to happen.

example.ex: As far as he was concerned there was no question of betraying his own comrades...
example.tran: 就他而言，背叛自己的同志是不可能的。

example.ex: There is no question of the taxpayer picking up the bill for the party.
example.tran: 要纳税人为该党买单是不可能的。

entry.tran: 毫无疑问地;毫无异议地
entry.def: If you do something without question, you do it without arguing or asking why it is necessary.

example.ex: ...military formations, carrying out without question the battle orders of superior officers.
example.tran: 毫无异议地执行上级军官的战斗命令的部队编队

entry.tran: 毫无疑问(表示强调自己的观点)
entry.def: You use without question to emphasize the opinion you are expressing.

example.ex: He was our greatest storyteller, without question.
example.tran: 毫无疑问，他是我们最会讲故事的人。

means.word_mean: 1. an instance of questioning;

sentences.sentence: "there was a question about my training"
"we made inquiries of all those who were present"

means.word_mean: 2. the subject matter at issue;

sentences.sentence: "the question of disease merits serious discussion"
"under the head of minor Roman poets"

means.word_mean: 3. a sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply;
4. uncertainty about the truth or factuality of existence of something;

sentences.sentence: "there is no question about the validity of the enterprise"

means.word_mean: 5. a formal proposal for action made to a deliberative assembly for discussion and vote;
6. an informal reference to a marriage proposal;

sentences.sentence: "he was ready to pop the question"

means.word_mean: 1. challenge the accuracy, probity, or propriety of;

sentences.sentence: "We must question your judgment in this matter"

means.word_mean: 2. pose a series of questions to;

sentences.sentence: "The suspect was questioned by the police"
"We questioned the survivor about the details of the explosion"

means.word_mean: 3. pose a question
4. conduct an interview in television, newspaper, and radio reporting
5. place in doubt or express doubtful speculation;

sentences.sentence: "I wonder whether this was the right thing to do"
"she wondered whether it would snow tonight"

auth_sentence.content: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not simply a question of personal responsibility.

auth_sentence.content: Is a question every BBC journalist is often asked.
auth_sentence.res_content: Is a question every BBC journalist is often asked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is a question every BBC journalist is often asked.

auth_sentence.content: The future of the pigs is a tough question.
auth_sentence.res_content: The future of the pigs is a tough question.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The future of the pigs is a tough question.

stems_affixes.word_buile: question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
con全部+quest寻求,询问→全部寻求到→征服
in进入+quest寻求,询问→问进去→审问
quest寻求,询问→n.探寻,探求;寻求,追求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问
question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
re再+quest寻求,询问→在寻求→请求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问

Sentence.sentence: The question of whether our government should promote science and technology or the liberal arts in higher education isn't an either/or proposition(命题),although the current emphasis on preparing young Americans for STEM（science, technology, engineering, maths）-related fields can make it seem that way.
There is no question that the United States imports a great deal of energy and, in fact, relies on that steady flow to maintain its economy
Maybe you will put question marks in the margin when you don't understand something and before an exam.

means.word_mean: 问题

sentences.en: I asked you a question and you didn't answer.
sentences.cn: 我问了你一个问题, 但你没有回答。

means.word_mean: 议题; 难题; （待讨论或处理的）事情

sentences.en: At the end of the meeting, a number of important questions were still unresolved.
sentences.cn: 会议结束时, 一些重大的问题仍悬而未决。

means.word_mean: 疑问, 不能肯定的事

sentences.en: If you have any questions, ask the director.
sentences.cn: 若有问题, 你可问主任。

sentences.en: There has been some question as to whether or not the President will resign.
sentences.cn: 总统是否会辞职还不确定。

sentences.en: It's a difficult question to decide.
sentences.cn: 这是个难以决定的问题。

sentences.en: I think that I've managed to solve the question of what to buy my mother for her birthday.
sentences.cn: 我认为我自己解决了给妈妈买什么东西来作生日礼物的问题。

sentences.en: These are questions that lie outside the purview of our inquiry.
sentences.cn: 这些都不是属于我们调查范围的问题。

means.word_mean: 问(某人)问题; 正式提问; 质询; 问

sentences.en: I prefer questioning my pupils to lecturing them.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢少讲课, 多提问我的学生。

means.word_mean: 对(某事物)表示[感到]怀疑

sentences.en: I would never question his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会怀疑他的诚实。

sentences.en: I question if you can do it.
sentences.cn: 我对你能否做这件事表示怀疑。

sentences.en: He questioned whether she could have arrived in time.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑她是否能准时到达。

sentences.en: It can't be questioned that we will win the final victory.
sentences.cn: 我们将最终取得胜利, 这是确定无疑的。

jushi.english: If you have any questions, ask the director.He's in charge.
jushi.chinese: 若有问题,你可问主任。他负责一切。

jushi.english: The professor said that he would not go into the question in great detail.
jushi.chinese: 教授说他今天就不十分详细地谈这个问题了。

jushi.english: There was absolutely no question about the diagnosis, she had lung cancer.
jushi.chinese: 业已完全确诊,她得了肺癌。
